T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (X, Y) = map(int, input().split())
    print(X + Y - 1) if X == Y else print(X + Y)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (total, chicken) = map(int, input().split())
    healthy = total - chicken
    res = chicken * 2 + healthy
    print(res - 1 if healthy == 0 else res)
